W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_AMYA_CENTERLIFT_000_DETAIL.text: You can use this lift to get down to the lower level where your cat is.

W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_AMYA_RETURN_010_DETAIL.text: You've found your cat. Time to head back to Miyako City.

W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_000_TITLE.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_000_TITLE.text: Yellow Division, the Cultural Research Group

W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_AMYA_CLT_06_120_000_DETAIL.text: It's time to get some help finding your cat.

W10_GIMK_AMYA_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_AMYA_CLT_06_MON_01_DETAIL.text: What is up with the strange life-forms in the lower level?

W10_GIMK_AMYA_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_GIMK_AMYA_CLT_06_MON_04_DETAIL.text: What is up with the strange life-forms in the lower level?

W10_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_EVAR_AMYA_NEKO_000_DETAIL.text: There should be a cat around here.

W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W10_WRLD_AMYA_INITIAL_000_DETAIL.text: A world straight out of a sci-fi tale awaited you on the other side of the door. Could there really be a cat here?
